title: Add book information to the new website
description: The attached patch modifies the new website design to incorporate the book information.  It ads a header "mantle" slideshow entry with both book images (just the 2 current books), and it adds a book page with the 3 books published (this includes the 1st edition that is out of date now).  The image files referenced are the same actual binary images on the current website by I chose a more consistent naming convention.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content:
I committed this just now.  It'd be nice to have fellow committers comment on the results before it winds up getting published from staging.

http://lucene.staging.apache.org/solr/books.html

comments.author: Chris Male
comments.content: Did a quick glance, looks great, +1
